title: Newtonville wonderful modern and spacious Colonial Available 7/9.
posting_body: ['No lead.', 'This house has been put in tip top shape.', 'Modern, light, bright and airy.', 'This 4 Bedroom 4.5 bath Newtonville Colonial is 3,784 sq.', 'ft and on four levels.', 'The first floor has a living room with a gas fireplace, a marvelous eat-in kitchen with upscale appliances including gas cooking and there is a formal dining room, a sunroom and a half bath.', 'The second floor has 4 bedrooms that includes a master bedroom with a master bath that has a Jacuzzi.', 'There are three other bedrooms and 2 more baths on the second floor.', 'The third floor has an office area.', 'The wonderful lower level has a nice size entertainment room (TV and Bose stereo) and a wet bar, an additional room currently being used as a workout room could be used as a bedroom and would make a great suite for an au-pair and has a separate entrance.', 'There is a built-in surround sound system throughout the house.', 'The house is heated by gas and has central air.', 'There is a security system and a two-car attached garage.', 'The yard is level, nice size and fenced in.', 'Close to the Commuter Rail, other public transportation and all that Newtonville has to offer.', 'Near schools, shopping, markets, restaurants, parks, walking trails, tennis courts and more.', 'This rental is a gem!', '**PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR PHONE NUMBER WHEN RESPONDING TO THIS AD..**', "Note: Can't be shown until Wednesday June 29th."]
